冷蔵保存: (れいぞうほぞん) - chilled storage; refrigerated storage
冷蔵室: (れいぞうしつ) - cold room; refrigerated room
冷血動物: (れいけつどうぶつ) - cold-blooded animal
冷血漢: (れいけつかん) - cold-blooded person; heartless; coldhearted person
冷製: (れいせい) - cold dish (e.g. at a restaurant)
冷視: (れいし) - giving a cold look; icy stare; taking a cold-hearted attitude
冷酷: (れいこく) - cruelty; coldheartedness; relentless; ruthless
冷酷無情: (れいこくむじょう) - (yoji) cruel and heartless; merciless; implacable
冷酷無惨: (れいこくむざん) - (yoji) cruel and heartless; merciless; implacable; cold-blooded
冷酷無慙: (れいこくむざん) - (yoji) cruel and heartless; merciless; implacable; cold-blooded
冷酷無慚: (れいこくむざん) - (yoji) cruel and heartless; merciless; implacable; cold-blooded
冷酷無残: (れいこくむざん) - (yoji) cruel and heartless; merciless; implacable; cold-blooded
冷静: (reisei) - calma, compostura, frieza, serenidade, presença de espírito
冷静になる: (れいせいになる) - (ant: 感情にはしる) to collect oneself; to chill out; to cool off; to recover oneself
冷静に成る: (れいせいになる) - (ant: 感情にはしる) to collect oneself; to chill out; to cool off; to recover oneself
冷静沈着: (れいせいちんちゃく) - (yoji) calm, cool, and collected; level and calm
冷風: (れいふう) - cold wind; chilly breeze; (blast of) cold air
冷飯: (つめためし) - cold rice; (ひやめし only)   hanger-on/dependent; (ひやめし only) disgraced former actor
冷飯食い: (ひやめしぐい) - hanger-on/dependent; someone who is received coldly; third, fourth, fifth, etc. sons (during the Edo period when only the oldest male could inherit an estate)
冷麦: (ひやむぎ) - cold noodles; iced noodles
冷麺: (れいめん) - cold noodles (in Korean style); chilled Chinese noodles; cold Chinese noodles accompanied by soup for dipping
凄い: (sugoi) - terrible, dreadful; amazing (ex. de força), great (e.g. of skills), wonderful, terrific , terrible, dreadful; amazing (e.g. of strength), great (e.g. of skills), wonderful, terrific; to a great extent, vast (in numbers)
凄くない: (すごくない) - cool! (only when said or written in a questioning tone); incredible; unbelievable
凄じい: (すさまじい) - terrific; fierce; terrible; tremendous; dreadful; awful; amazing; absurd; cutthroat; intense
凄まじい: (すさまじい) - terrific; fierce; terrible; tremendous; dreadful; awful; amazing; absurd; cutthroat; intense
凄みを利かす: (すごみをきかす) - to threaten; to intimidate
凄みを利かせる: (すごみをきかせる) - to threaten; to intimidate
凄惨: (せいさん) - ghastly; gruesome; appalling; lurid
凄技: (すごわざ) - (abbr. of 凄い技) amazing trick; amazing skill
凄絶: (せいぜつ) - extremely gruesome; lurid; violent; bloody; fierce
凄腕: (すごうで) - go-getter/live wire/resourceful person/wizard/virtuoso; remarkable ability/mastery/brilliant technique
准える: (なずらえる) - to pattern after; to liken to; to imitate
准じる: (じゅんじる) - to follow; to conform; to apply to
准ずる: (じゅんずる) - to apply correspondingly; to correspond to; to be proportionate to; to conform to

准提観音: (じゅんでいかんのん) - Cundi (manifestation of Avalokitesvara)
准教員: (じゅんきょういん) - assistant teacher; junior teacher
准教授: (じゅんきょうじゅ) - associate professor
准胝観音: (じゅんでいかんのん) - Cundi (manifestation of Avalokitesvara)
凋む: (しぼむ) - to wither (e.g. flowers, dreams); to sag (e.g. balloon, grapes); to fade (away); to shrivel; to wilt; to deflate
凋れる: (しおれる) - (esp. 萎れる, 凋れる) to wither/to wilt/to droop/to fade; (esp. 萎れる, 悄れる) to be dejected/to be disheartened/to be depressed/to be crestfallen
凋落: (ちょうらく) - decline; fall; decay; withering
凌ぐ: (しのぐ) - to endure/to keep out (e.g. rain)/to stave off (e.g. starvation); to pull through/to get over/to survive; to surpass/to outdo/to excel/to eclipse/to defy/to slight
凌虐: (りょうぎゃく) - humiliation; indignity; affront; assault
凌辱: (りょうじょく) - insult/affront/disgrace/indignity; sexual assault/rape
凌遅: (りょうち) - Lingchi; Leng Tch'e; slow torture by slicing off parts of the body
凌雲: (りょううん) - skyscraping; very high; above the clouds; above this mortal world
凌霄: (りょうしょう) - Chinese trumpet creeper (Campsis grandiflora)
凌霄花: (ノウゼンカズラ) - Chinese trumpet creeper (Campsis grandiflora)
凌霄葉蓮: (ノウゼンハレン) - nasturtium (species of Indian cress, Tropaeolum majus)
凌駕: (りょうが) - excelling; surpassing; outdoing; superior

凍える: (こごえる) - to freeze; to be chilled; to be frozen
凍え付く: (こごえつく) - to freeze to; to be frozen to

凍え死ぬ: (こごえじぬ) - to freeze to death; to die of cold

凍てる: (いてる) - to freeze; to be frozen over; to congeal
